summary.overview: This JCL job compiles a batch COBOL program named BATCHPGM using standardized build procedures. It utilizes the CARDDEMO utility library's BUILDBAT procedure to perform automated compilation with appropriate system resource allocation.
business_functions: Compile COBOL batch program BATCHPGM using automated build procedures
Execute standardized compilation process through BUILDBAT procedure
Provide job completion notification to submitting user

datasource_summary.name: CardDemo Procedure Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PRC.UTIL)
datasource_summary.function: Procedure library containing JCL procedures and utilities used during the compilation and build process. Provides reusable procedures like BUILDBAT for standardized compilation workflows.

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    BATCHPGM["COBOL batch program being compiled (BATCHPGM) "]
